rules.description: Hyper Key: Right Option Key → left shift + left option + left command (⌃⇧⌥⌘)
Hyper Key: Caps Lock → left control + left shift + right command (⌃⇧⌘)
Hyper Key: Tab (held down) → left control + left command (⌃⌘)
Mac OSX: double-tap right shift key → caps lock toggle
Mac OSX: left cmd + double-tap q → close application
Mac OSX: disable cmd + h to prevent minimising an application window
Mac OSX: disable cmd + option + h + m to prevent minimising all windows
Mac OSX: fn + l → Lock Screen
Mac OSX: fn + s → Screen Saver
VS Code: Caps Lock Hyper Key + a → quick open (search for a file)
VS Code: Caps Lock Hyper Key + s → search symbols
VS Code: Caps Lock Hyper Key + d → command palette
VS Code: Caps Lock Hyper Key + q → zen mode
VS Code: Caps Lock Hyper Key + w → toggle sidebar
VS Code: Caps Lock Hyper Key + e → toggle terminal
VS Code: Caps Lock Hyper Key + 3 → focus sidebar
VS Code: Caps Lock Hyper Key + 4 → close terminal
VS Code: Caps Lock Hyper Key and - → fold level 2
VS Code: Caps Lock Hyper Key and = → unfold all
VS Code: right cmd → zen mode
VS Code: mouse button 3 → zen mode
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + 1 → Developer Tools
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + 2 → Developer Console
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + 3 → Developer Elements Panel
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + 4 → View Source Code
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + q → Profile Selector
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + w → Toggle between last used tabs (requires CLUT: Cycle Last Used Tabs extension)
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + e → Duplicate tab (requires Duplicate Tab Shortcut extension)
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + r → Reload page
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + t → Move tab to new window (requires Pop out tabs to new window extension)
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + a → Search Tabs
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + s → Select address
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + d → Clear browsing data
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + f → Search the web
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + g → View downloads
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + h → Close tabs to the left (requires Close Other Tabs extension)
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + j → Close other tabs (requires Close Other Tabs extension)
Google Chrome: Caps lock hyper key + k → Close tabs to the right (requires Close Other Tabs extension)
Google Chrome: mouse button 3 → Developer Tools
Google Chrome: left ctrl + mouse button 3 → Developer Console
Google Chrome: left option + mouse button 3 → Developer Elements Panel
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + 1 → Launch quick search
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + 2 → Activity
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + 3 → DMs
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + 4 → All Unread Messages
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + q → format selection as quote
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + w → toggle sidebar
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + e → set status
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + a → code format
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + s → code block
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + d → hyperlink
Slack: Caps Lock Hyper key + f → Upload file
Slack: mouse button 3 → launch search
Premiere Pro: left shift + mouse button 1 → cut
Premiere Pro: mouse button 2 → ripple trim to previous edit playhead
Premiere Pro: horizontal timeline scroll with mouse button 3 (hold button 3 to scroll; release to go back to selection tool)
OpenAI: New chat with mouse button 3 (OpenAI: New chat)
OpenAI: delete chat history with shift + mouse button 3 (OpenAI: Delete chat history)
Mac OSX: Use Function Keys in Supported Apps, else use Media Keys
Hyper Key sublayer "b"
Hyper Key sublayer "a"
Hyper Key sublayer "r"
Hyper Key sublayer "x"
